Articles.Content:
Here is my first Jet called the **HAJ2** or **H**igh **A**ltitude **J**et **2**.

Needless to say, HAJ1 didn\'t make the cut...HAJ2 is a simple space plane that proves to be very reliable.

Suggestions on how to improve this design are appreciated.

Here are some pictures of it:

> ![lkP13.png](http://i.imgur.com/lkP13.png)

> ![ybxMO.png](http://i.imgur.com/ybxMO.png)

> ![t7r6G.png](http://i.imgur.com/t7r6G.png)

> ![5xhrM.png](http://i.imgur.com/5xhrM.png)

.Craft available for download.

looks pretty nice tbh but it\'s not really a space plane because it\'s only got aero engines so it won\'t go much above 15km. If you\'re staying in the atmosphere I\'d stick to the smaller cockpits and fuselage.

But if you want to go in to orbit you\'ll need an aerospike engine and some more fuel.
